TopicTitle: Craft files universal for Mac and windows?

Articles.Content: I make my ships at home on my Mac, but I want to download ksp on my windows computer at work. I use no mods. If I run my crafts save folder out of my Dropbox for both games on both computers, will this work correctly? Thanks!
As far as I know, there's no issue with it.

I make my ships at home on my Mac, but I want to download ksp on my windows computer at work. I use no mods. If I run my crafts save folder out of my Dropbox for both games on both computers, will this work correctly? Thanks!

I know firsthand that it works, i have shared craft files with someone who was using a mac.
Yep, the .craft file format is universal for Mac, PC, and Linux. Go crazy with transferring those files, and welcome to the forums!
Thanks! Forums here are crazy good and responsive. Haven't been so passionate about a game as I have been with KSP. So so good. Thanks!
